resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/104346</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>104346</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205388</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The Jet Set: Alonzo King</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Strahl Set: Alonzo König</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le Voyager en jet A placé : Roi d'Alonzo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O Jogo De Jato: Rei De Alonzo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'Insieme Di Getto: Re Di Alonzo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το αεριωθούμενο αεροπλάνο που τίθεται: Βασιλιάς 
Alonzo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El Conjunto De Jet: Rey De Alonzo</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Choreographer Alonzo King has created contemporary ballets for more than fifty international dance companies as well as dozens of pieces for film, television, opera and his own company, LINES Ballet. This Educator Guide tracks the history of modern-contemporary ballet and the contributions of King and other innovative choreographers.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <coverage>
            <string language="en">North America</string>
          </coverage>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Choreograph Alonzo König hat zeitgenössische 
Balletts für mehr als fünfzig internationale Tanzfirmen sowie 
Dutzende Stücke für Film, Fernsehen, Oper und seine eigene Firma, 
LINES Ballett erstellt. Diese Erzieher-Anleitung spürt die 
Geschichte des modern-zeitgenössischen Balletts und der Beiträge des
Königs und anderer erfinderischer Choreographen auf.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le roi d'Alonzo de chorégraphe a créé des 
ballets contemporains pour plus de cinquante compagnies 
internationales de danse aussi bien que des douzaines de morceaux pour
le film, la télévision, l'opéra et sa propre compagnie, LIGNES 
ballet. Ce guide d'éducateur dépiste l'histoire du ballet 
moderne-contemporain et des contributions du roi et d'autres 
chorégraphes innovateurs.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O rei de Alonzo do choreographer criou ballets 
contemporary para mais de cinqüênta companhias internacionais da 
dança as.well.as dúzias das partes para a película, a televisão, a
ópera e a sua própria companhia, LINHAS ballet. Esta guia do 
educador segue o history do ballet moderno-modern-contemporary e das 
contribuições do rei e de outros choreographers inovativos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il re di Alonzo del choreographer ha creato i 
balletti contemporanei per più di cinquanta aziende internazionali
di ballo così come le dozzine delle parti per la pellicola, la 
televisione, l'opera e la sua propria azienda, le RIGHE Balletto. 
Questa guida dell'educatore rintraccia la storia di balletto 
moderno-contemporaneo ed i contributi del re e di altri choreographers
innovatori.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο βασιλιάς Alonzo χορογράφος έχει δημιουργήσει 
τα σύγχρονα μπαλέτα για περισσότερες από πενήντα διεθνείς 
επιχειρήσεις χορού καθώς επίσης και τις δωδεκάδες των κομματιών 
για την ταινία, την τηλεόραση, την όπερα και την επιχείρησή του, 
μπαλέτο ΓΡΑΜΜΩΝ. Αυτός ο οδηγός εκπαιδευτικών ακολουθεί την
ιστορία του σύγχρονος-σύγχρονου μπαλέτου και τις συνεισφορές του 
βασιλιά και άλλων καινοτόμων χορογράφος.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El rey de Alonzo del coreógrafo ha creado los 
ballets clásicos contemporáneos para más de cincuenta compañías 
internacionales de la danza así como docenas de pedazos para la 
película, la televisión, la ópera y su propia compañía, LÍNEAS 
ballet clásico. Esta guía del educador sigue la historia del 
ballet clásico moderno-contempora'neo y de las contribuciones del rey
y de otros coreógrafos innovadores.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Künste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Arti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τέχνες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205388</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0

          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>104346</entry>
    </identifier>

      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>

  </manifestation>
